revised_title: Lunar Variations of Magnetic Declination at Bombay
tldr: This paper discusses the lunar variations of magnetic declination at Bombay, focusing on observations from 1861 to 1863. The author highlights that the mean lunar-diurnal variation has a small range compared to other lunar-diurnal variations and that the semiannual inequality in the lunar-diurnal variation is subject to significant modifications related to the moon's phase.
